dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S206 IS: HUBZone Expansion Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Collins (for herself and Mr. King) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship

form.official-title: To expand the HUBZone program for communities affected by base realignment and closure, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the HUBZone Expansion Act of 2013.

section.header: Expanding HUBZone program for communities affected by base realignment and closure
section.text: Section 3(p)(4)(D) of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 632(p)(4)(D)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in clause (iv), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and;
in the matter preceding subclause (I), as so redesignated, by striking means lands within and inserting the following: “means—
by adding at the end the following:

item.text: the municipality in which the military installation is located;
the county in which the military installation is located; or

subitem.text: the census tract in which the military installation is located; or

subclause.text: has a total population of not more than 50,000, as determined with reference to the most recent decennial census.
